name: UFO Mooooo!
description:
The Orgs, Blorgs, and Xyngs have landed on Earth in search of the delicacies of Cows. They have traveled from galaxy to galaxy in search of the finest dairy products. 

Their search led them to a farm in the midwest United States where the Cows roam free. Now they must fight amongst themselves to take as many Cows back to their home planet as possible. 

Play with or compete against your friends in 3 game modes - Crop Circle Art, Competitive Multiplayer, and Co-Op to see who will make their home planet proud!
